instructions:
Stir 1 cup boiling water into lemon gelatin in medium bowl at least 2 min. until completely dissolved. Stir in 1/2 cup cold water. Pour into 8-inch square pan. Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm.
Stir remaining 1 cup boiling water into orange gelatin in large bowl at least 2 min. until completely dissolved. Stir in 1/2 cup cold water. Refrigerate about 20 min. or until slightly thickened (consistency of unbeaten egg whites).
Cut lemon gelatin into 1/2-inch cubes or decorative shapes. Add gelatin cubes and whipped topping to orange gelatin; stir gently until well blended. Refrigerate until mixture will mound. Pour into crust. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or until firm.
ingredients: 1 pkg. (4 serving size) JELL-O Brand Lemon Flavor Gelatin
1 pkg. (4 serving size) JELL-O Brand Orange Flavor Gelatin
2 cups thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping
1 (6 ounce) HONEY MAID Graham Pie Crust
title: Confetti Pie
